text: @SenJoniErnst This isn’t time to bail out cruise lines (offshore not even US companies), corporations in general. OUR IRA’s are going to crash even more today. I’ll have nothing left even if covid19 doesn’t get me. This is why @GOP is useless to average Americans. Got nothing left to lose. 🖕

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
